betterstats.translators.title: Translators
betterstats.contributors.title: Contributors
betterstats.translators.tutorial: The translators section below is in CSV format. Just place a comma (,) and write your unique GitHub username. Example: 'TheCSDev, SomeOtherUser, AndSoOn'.
commands.statistics.clear.kick: Your statistics were cleared, which requires you to disconnect and re-join.
betterstats.client.gui.stats.panel.stats: There are no stats to show yet...
betterstats.api.client.gui.screen.better: When enabled, scrolling the statistics panels will be 'smoothly animated'. Disable this if you play on lower-end devices, or if scrolling via mouse-wheel doesn't work at all for you.

When this mod is installed on a server, it offers more features. The 'betterstats' network protocol is how a 'betterstats' server communicates with the 'betterstats' client. With this enabled, the client will automatically tell the server it has 'betterstats' installed when applicable. With this disabled, you will have do it manually yourself each time you join a server.
betterstats.api.client.registry.bsclient: You've shown true dedication! You have played on this world for at least 12 days (288 hours).
Your loyalty is commendable! You have played on this world for at least 24 days (576 hours).
You've held the symbol of ultimate triumph - the Dragon Egg.

Through mountains high and valleys low, you've traveled far, with much to show. Seeking a sight, a tale untold, a journey's measure in blocks of gold. And then you saw it...

You have traveled for at least 727,000 blocks.

You have managed to cheat death, for now. Will you continue to evade the inevitable?

You have survived for at least 12 hours.
betterstats.client.gui.screen.hud.better: Right click a statistic ([Shift]+RMB) to add it here.
Right click a HUD entry to modify or remove it.
Press Escape (ESC) to close this screen.
betterstats.network.betterstatsnetworkha:
IMPORTANT:
By enabling this feature, the server will find out that you are using a modified client with 'betterstats' installed. To protect your privacy, do not use this feature on servers that may not allow modified clients or this mod.

Enabling this feature adds some extra features that are available when the mod is installed on the server as well.
betterstats.util.stats.statannouncements: %s just died for their first time.
%s just died for their first time. On the bright side, it likely won't happen again.
%s just killed a %s for their first time.
%s just died to a %s for their first time.
%s just increased their '%s' stat value to %s.
